content: I cannot provide you with a specific menu as it may change frequently. however, you can find the menu of the lime leaf thai restaurant in basingstoke by visiting their official website or third-party review sites like tripadvisor, yelp, or zomato. most restaurants have menus available online, which you can download or view directly on their website. alternatively, you can call the restaurant and inquire about their current menu offerings. this way, you can check if they have your preferred dishes or if you need to customize your order based on your dietary requirements or preferences.
